items.name: AI hotel data cleanup for agent discoverability
items.idea_summary: AI agent that audits and fixes hotel content/data so properties appear correctly in AI booking agents. By 2030, 30% of bookings via AI agents; hotels with fragmented data disappear from agent decision sets. Weekly audits, fix structured content. Why now: 2026 narrow setup window.
items.why_now_thesis: Agentic AI tipping point 2026 (IDC, Mews). LLMs + APIs parse/validate at scale. No well-funded player in wedge.

items.name: Agentic back-office for hotels
items.idea_summary: AI handles housekeeping coordination, guest comms, check-in. Replaces 22+ staff hrs/week. Recurring daily. Why now: labor shortage (40.5% turnover), agentic AI crossed threshold.
items.why_now_thesis: Labor acute pain. Agentic AI executes workflows. 50% back-office automated by 2035. Bootstrap only.

items.name: Hotel payment recovery / dunning
items.idea_summary: AI dunning for hotel groups: recovers failed payments, card updates. 20-40% churn is payment failure. Recurring weekly. Why now: Stripe APIs + LLM classification.
items.why_now_thesis: Payment recovery proven in SaaS. Hotel groups same pain. No vertical player.
